Login_Index_Forgot.description: When a user has forgotten their password, they ask for a reset email to be sent to their registered email address.

vars.userId: User ID (including login method informat userid@method).
vars.loginMethod: Name of login method which they use to log into the system with.
vars.resetUrl: URL the user will need to go to to reset their password.

Login_Index_Signup.description: When a user signs up for a new account.

vars.userId: User ID (including login method informat userid@method).
vars.loginMethod: Name of login method which they use to log into the system with.
vars.password: The password they give to their account.

Admin_Account_Create_Password.description: When an administrator creates an account for a user where a password is dynamically generated for the user.

vars.userId: User ID (including login method informat userid@method).
vars.loginMethod: Name of login method which they use to log into the system with.
vars.password: The password they give to their account.
vars.role: Assigned role given to the user.

Admin_Account_Create_NoPassword.description: When an administrator creates an account for a user when no password is created for the user.

vars.userId: User ID (including login method informat userid@method).
vars.loginMethod: Name of login method which they use to log into the system with.
vars.role: Assigned role given to the user.
